channel.title: Lucas van de Meerendonk, NOS Jeugdjournaal on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate
channel.description: Recent content in Lucas van de Meerendonk, NOS Jeugdjournaal on Terence Dores Cruz - PhD Candidate

item.title: Waarom niemand roddelen leuk vindt, maar iedereen het toch doet
item.description: Interview with journalist Lucas van de Meerendonk about my work gossip for a YouTube series investigating different topics in a way that is understandable for children as part of the NOS Jeugdjournaal, the news for children.
